Uses of Package
Pacman

  • Classes in Pacman used by Pacman 
    Class Description
    Bonus
    Holds a definition of all the different bonuses.
    BonusEntity
    This class represents all the different bonus entities, according to the Bonus.
    Canvas
    Canvas is a class to allow for simple graphical drawing on a canvas.
    Drawable
    The drawable class is an abstract class which represents all the drawable object on the game using images to display them
    Entity
    The Entity class represents all the differents entities on the game, such as PacMan, bonuses, Ghosts It can also manage the collision between two entities.
    Fantome
    Fantome class represents the entity "Fantome" on the board It's a movable entity with the possibility to evolve in a spooked mode to be eaten by Pacman for a short amount of time.
    MoveableEntity
    The MoveableEntity class is a class which represents all the movable entities on the board game, such as Pacman or ghosts It manages the movement of all the entities
    Pac_Man
    Pacman class represents the entity "PacMan" on the board It's a movable entity with lives and the possibility to evolve in a SuperMode to eat ghosts for a short amount of time (15 seconds)
